module.name: Do-Not-Disturb (DND)
module.changelog: *2.7.0.1* #4294 *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.1* Added publisher/lic *2.6.0.0* #3650, #3651 *2.5.0.5* #3274 *2.5.0.4* #3215, localization fixes *2.5.0.3* localization, xml description, Swedish *2.5.0.2* #2969 change default value to *76 *2.5.0.1* #2909 Add DND hints *2.5.0* added toggle and support for func_devstate *2.4.0* bunp for 2.4 *1.0.2.2* changed category *1.0.2.1* bump for rc1 *1.0.2* changed ${CALLERID(number)} to ${AMPUSER} to accomodate CID number masquerading *1.0.1* First release for 2.2
